message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $15000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled value and functionality. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing this further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality you describe,  $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product, which is my maximum price point. Please let me know if you're willing to consider this offer.
